attributes.action: BRADFORD HAS HAD A LOT OF BUDGET CUTS NOW THEY ARE CUTTING OUR LIMBS!!!!!
attributes.additional_details:
It is also proposed that in 2020-2021 a further reduction of another £19.9 million will be cut from Bradford's budget.

Due to the cuts its also said that 100's of jobs will be cut.

Is this the reason why our taxes are to be increased and our budget cut and yet we are deprived of our services.

We need our budget to be addressed properly so that people who live here feel safe.

Due to the previous budget cuts people are now living in fear due to the increased crime.  

WE ARE NO LONGER SAFE!!!
attributes.background:
We have had our taxes increased by 2.99 percent purposed for this following tax year 2019.

Although the increase has been proposed, £13.5 millions of pounds of cuts to public services,libraries, museums  & street cleansing.

AND a rise in Council Tax by 1.99.

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about cuts to Bradford City Council's funding but we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You could start a new petition calling for the UK Government to give more funding to Bradford City Council if that is something you would like to see happen.
